PCI-DSS Compliance Module


Challenge

Being compliant with Payment Card Industry (PCI) Standards is a chief business concern for retailers, as it can impact customer experience, payment card security, and the reputation of the vendors.

The business required a bilingual (English and French) compliance signoff solution to provide awareness to newly hired store associates who has had none to little exposure to PCI standards.


Solution

In order to provide learning saturation data through a single course to the auditors, rather than developing two courses (an English and a French), I adjusted the Rise's user interface to develop the bilingual PCI content as a single-page application. One course, less time spent on auditing completions, better learner experience.


Technologies Used

Rise, After Effects, Audition, Illustrator
